name: purescript-optic-ui
description: PureScript UI framework based on lenses

scripts.example-todo: bower link && cd examples/todo && bower link purescript-optic-ui && gulp

scripts.example-effects: bower link && cd examples/effects && bower link purescript-optic-ui && gulp
